entry.title: Fear and Destruction Turn Ukraine's Front-Line Cities Into Ghost Towns
entry.content: As Moscow’s forces push west, seeking to dislodge Ukrainians from their positions and seize control of the country’s east, residents are fleeing in droves, aided by volunteers who risk their lives to ferry them out.

entry.title: Sweden's NATO Bid Rattles Kurdish Diaspora
entry.content: Turkey is blocking Sweden’s bid to join NATO over Stockholm’s contacts with Kurdish groups hoping to carve out a homeland straddling the borders of Turkey and Syria.
